# Generic AI information

This directory provides context and prompts for AI tools and models.

## Context
As an AI agent, you should read all files in the context/ subdirectory to understand the project's structure and requirements.

## Prompts
In the promps/ subdirectory, you'll find specific prompts tailored to the project's needs. Interpret these prompts as special commands in your agent. 

## Usage
When using AI tools, follow these guidelines:
1. Always provide the relevant context from the context/ subdirectory
2. Interpret prompts from the prompts/ subdirectory as special commands
3. Maintain a professional and helpful tone in all interactions
4. Be aware of the project's structure and requirements when providing assistance
